Public Class FormView Inherits CompositeDataBoundControl Implements IDataBoundItemControl, IDataItemContainer, IPostBackContainer, IPostBackEventHandler

public ref class FormView : System::Web::UI::WebControls::CompositeDataBoundControl, System::Web::UI::IDataItemContainer, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IDataBoundItemControl, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IPostBackContainer

summary.span: 利用使用者定義的範本，顯示資料來源中單一記錄的值。

span.span: Displays the values of a single record from a data source using user-defined templates.

summary.span: 控制項可讓您編輯、刪除及插入記錄。

span.span: The control allows you to edit, delete, and insert records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [範本Templates](#templates) - [繫結至資料Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [資料作業Data Operations](#data_operations) - [自訂使用者介面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項用來顯示資料來源的單一記錄。The control is used to display a single record from a data source. 類似於控制，但是它會顯示使用者定義的範本，而不是資料列欄位。It is similar to the control, except it displays user-defined templates instead of row fields. 建立您自己的範本，讓您更大的彈性來控制資料的顯示方式。Creating your own templates gives you greater flexibility in controlling how the data is displayed. 控制項支援下列功能：The control supports the following features: - 繫結至資料來源控制項，例如和。Binding to data source controls, such as and . - 內建的插入功能。Built-in inserting capabilities. - 內建更新和刪除功能。Built-in updating and deleting capabilities. - 內建的分頁功能。Built-in paging capabilities. - 以程式設計方式存取物件模型，以動態方式設定屬性、 處理事件，等等。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on. - 透過使用者定義的範本、 主題和樣式的可自訂外觀。Customizable appearance through user-defined templates, themes, and styles. ## 範本Templates 如控制項來顯示內容，您必須建立控制項的不同部分的範本。For the control to display content, you need to create templates for the different parts of the control. 大部分的範本是選擇性的。不過，您必須建立的範本，以及設定控制項的模式。Most templates are optional; however, you must create a template for the mode in which the control is configured. 例如，支援記錄插入控制項必須具有定義的插入項目範本。For example, a control that supports inserting records must have an insert item template defined. 下表列出您可以建立不同的範本。The following table lists the different templates that you can create. |範本類型Template type|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||定義資料的內容資料列時控制項處於編輯模式。Defines the content for the data row when the control is in edit mode. 此範本通常包含輸入的控制項和命令按鈕的使用者可以編輯現有的記錄。This template usually contains input controls and command buttons with which the user can edit an existing record.| ||定義的內容，空白資料列會顯示當控制項所繫結至資料來源不包含任何記錄。Defines the content for the empty data row displayed when the control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records. 此範本通常包含來提醒使用者資料來源不包含任何記錄的內容。This template usually contains content to alert the user that the data source does not contain any records.| ||定義頁尾資料列的內容。Defines the content for the footer row. 此範本通常包含您想要顯示頁尾資料列中的任何其他內容。This template usually contains any additional content you would like to display in the footer row. **注意：** 或者，您可以只指定要設定頁尾資料列中顯示的文字屬性。**Note:** As an alternative, you can simply specify text to display in the footer row by setting the property.| ||定義標頭資料列的內容。Defines the content for the header row. 此範本通常包含您想要在標頭資料列中顯示的任何其他內容。This template usually contains any additional content you would like to display in the header row. **注意：** 或者，您可以只指定要設定標頭列中顯示的文字屬性。**Note:** As an alternative, you can simply specify text to display in the header row by setting the property.| ||定義資料的內容資料列時控制項處於唯讀模式。Defines the content for the data row when the control is in read-only mode. 此範本通常包含用來顯示現有記錄的值。This template usually contains content to display the values of an existing record.| ||定義資料的內容資料列時控制項處於插入模式。Defines the content for the data row when the control is in insert mode. 此範本通常包含輸入的控制項和命令按鈕的使用者可以加入新的記錄。This template usually contains input controls and command buttons with which the user can add a new record.| ||定義啟用分頁功能時顯示的頁面巡覽列的內容 (當屬性設定為`true`)。Defines the content for the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`). 此範本通常包含的控制項的使用者可以瀏覽至另一筆記錄。This template usually contains controls with which the user can navigate to another record. **注意：** 控制項的內建的頁面巡覽區列使用者介面 (UI)。**Note:** The control has a built-in pager row user interface (UI). 您要建立頁面巡覽區範本，只有當您想要建立您自己的自訂頁面巡覽區資料列。You need to create a pager template only if you want to create your own custom pager row.| 若要顯示的欄位值中的項目範本，請使用資料繫結運算式。To display the value of a field in an item template, use a data binding expression. 如需資料繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information on data binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). 編輯項目樣板和插入項目樣板中的輸入的控制項可以繫結至資料來源的欄位使用雙向繫結運算式。Input controls in the edit item template and insert item template can be bound to the fields of a data source by using a two-way binding expression. 這可讓自動擷取更新的輸入控制項的值或插入作業的控制項。This allows the control to automatically extract the values of the input control for an update or insert operation. 雙向繫結運算式也可以讓輸入的控制項中自動顯示原始欄位值的編輯項目範本。Two-way binding expressions also allow input controls in an edit item template to automatically display the original field values. 如需雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 繫結至資料Binding to Data 控制項可以繫結至資料來源控制項 (例如， ，或) 或任何資料來源集合中實作介面，例如， ， ，或其他集合型別。The control can be bound to a data source control (such as , , or ) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types. 使用下列方法的其中一個繫結控制項至適當的資料來源類型：Use one of the following methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 若要繫結至資料來源控制項，將屬性控制權傳輸至資料來源控制項的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項，並可使用的資料來源控制項的功能，以執行插入、 更新、 刪除和分頁功能。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control and can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities to perform inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 這是慣用的方法繫結至資料。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 繫結至資料來源實作介面，以程式設計方式設定屬性控制權傳輸至資料來源，然後呼叫方法。To bind to a data source that implements the interface, programmatically set the property of the control to the data source and then call the method. 當使用此方法，控制項不提供內建的插入、 更新、 刪除和分頁功能。When using this method, the control does not provide built-in inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 您需要提供此功能使用適當的事件。You need to provide this functionality by using the appropriate event. 如需資料繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 資料存取內容對應](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information on data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). > [!NOTE] > 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 可能的話，強烈建議，值經過 HTML 編碼，才能讓它們顯示在這個控制項。Whenever possible, it is strongly recommended that values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in this control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證控制項簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190)。For more information, see [Introduction to the Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190). ## 資料作業Data Operations 控制項提供許多內建功能可讓使用者更新、 刪除、 插入和控制項中的項目頁面上。The control provides many built-in capabilities that allow the user to update, delete, insert, and page through items in the control. 當控制項所繫結至資料來源控制項，控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動更新、 刪除、 插入和分頁功能。When the control is bound to a data source control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating, deleting, inserting, and paging functionality. > [!NOTE] > 控制項可以為 update、 delete、 insert 和分頁作業與其他類型的資料來源提供的支援; 不過，您必須提供適當的事件處理常式，實作這些作業。The control can provide support for update, delete, insert, and paging operations with other types of data sources; however, you must provide an appropriate event handler with the implementation for these operations. 因為控制項使用的範本，它不提供自動產生命令按鈕來執行更新、 刪除或插入作業的方法。Because the control uses templates, it does not provide a way to automatically generate command buttons to perform updating, deleting, or inserting operations. 您必須手動加入這些命令按鈕，在適當的樣板。You must manually include these command buttons in the appropriate template. 控制項辨認某些按鈕具有其`CommandName`屬性設定為特定值。The control recognizes certain buttons that have their `CommandName` properties set to specific values. 下表列出的命令按鈕的控制項辨認。The following table lists the command buttons that the control recognizes. |按鈕Button|CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| |取消Cancel|[取消]"Cancel"|取消作業，並捨棄使用者所輸入的值，更新或插入作業中使用。Used in updating or inserting operations to cancel the operation and to discard the values entered by the user. 控制然後傳回所指定的模式屬性。The control then returns to the mode specified by the property.| |刪除Delete|"Delete""Delete"|用於刪除作業，以刪除資料來源中顯示的記錄。Used in deleting operations to delete the displayed record from the data source. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |EditEdit|[編輯]"Edit"|在更新作業中用來放置控制項處於編輯模式。Used in updating operations to put the control in edit mode. 在指定的內容屬性會顯示為資料列。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |InsertInsert|「 插入 」"Insert"|用於插入作業，以嘗試使用由使用者所提供的值的資料來源中插入新的記錄。Used in inserting operations to attempt to insert a new record in the data source using the values provided by the user. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |新增New|"New""New"|在插入作業中用來放置在插入模式下的控制項。Used in inserting operations to put the control in insert mode. 在指定的內容屬性會顯示為資料列。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |頁面Page|「 頁面 」"Page"|用於分頁作業，以代表執行分頁的頁面巡覽列中按鈕。Used in paging operations to represent a button in the pager row that performs paging. 指定的分頁作業，請設定`CommandArgument`下一步 」、 「 Prev"、"First"、 「 最後 」，或要瀏覽頁面的索引按鈕的屬性。To specify the paging operation, set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "Next", "Prev", "First", "Last", or the index of the page to which to navigate. 引發和事件。Raises the and events. **注意：** 這種類型的按鈕通常只用於頁面巡覽區範本。**Note:** This type of button is typically used only in the pager template.| |更新Update|「 更新 」"Update"|用於更新作業，以嘗試更新資料來源中顯示的記錄，使用者所提供的值。Used in updating operations to attempt to update the displayed record in the data source with the values provided by the user. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| 不同於 [刪除] 按鈕 （這會立即刪除顯示的記錄），按一下 [編輯] 或 [新增] 按鈕時，編輯，或分別插入模式中，控制項便會進入。Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the displayed record immediately), when the Edit or New button is clicked, the control goes into edit or insert mode, respectively. 在編輯模式中，內容包含在屬性會顯示目前的資料項目。In edit mode, the content contained in the property is displayed for the current data item. 一般而言，編輯項目樣板會定義成將 編輯 按鈕會取代的更新 和 取消 按鈕。Typically, the edit item template is defined such that the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button. 輸入適用於該欄位的資料類型的控制項 (例如或控制項) 通常也會顯示與使用者修改欄位的值。Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a or a control) are also usually displayed with a field's value for the user to modify. 按一下 更新 按鈕更新資料來源中的記錄，而按一下取消 5d; 按鈕會放棄所有變更。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes. 同樣地，將中所包含的內容控制項處於插入模式時，將會顯示之資料項目的屬性。Likewise, the content contained in the property is displayed for the data item when the control is in insert mode. 插入項目範本通常是在 新增 按鈕會取代 Insert 和 取消 5d; 按鈕，而使用者輸入新記錄的值會顯示空白的輸入的控制項的定義。The insert item template is typically defined such that the New button is replaced with an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for the user to enter the values for the new record. 按一下 插入 按鈕在資料來源插入記錄，而按一下取消 5d; 按鈕會放棄所有變更。Clicking the Insert button inserts the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes. 控制項提供分頁功能，可讓使用者巡覽至其他資料來源中的記錄。The control provides a paging feature, which allows the user to navigate to other records in the data source. 啟用時，頁面巡覽列會顯示在包含頁面導覽控制項的控制項。When enabled, a pager row is displayed in the control that contains the page navigation controls. 若要啟用分頁，屬性`true`。To enable paging, set the property to `true`. 您可以自訂頁面巡覽列中包含的物件屬性來設定和屬性。You can customize the pager row by setting the properties of objects contained in the and the property. 而不是使用內建的頁面巡覽列 UI，您可以建立自己的 UI 使用屬性。Instead of using the built-in pager row UI, you can create your own UI by using the property. ## 自訂使用者介面Customizing the User Interface 您可以自訂的外觀藉由設定控制項的不同部分的樣式屬性的控制項。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||樣式設定為資料列時控制項處於編輯模式。The style settings for the data row when the control is in edit mode.| ||空白資料列中顯示的樣式設定控制當資料來源不包含任何記錄。The style settings for the empty data row displayed in the control when the data source does not contain any records.| ||頁尾資料列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the footer row of the control.| ||標頭資料列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the header row of the control.| ||樣式設定為資料列時控制項處於插入模式。The style settings for the data row when the control is in insert mode.| ||頁面巡覽列中顯示的樣式設定控制啟用分頁功能時。The style settings for the pager row displayed in the control when the paging feature is enabled.| ||樣式設定為資料列時控制項處於唯讀模式。The style settings for the data row when the control is in read-only mode.| ## 事件Events 控制項提供數個事件，您可以程式設計的。The control provides several events that you can program against. 這可讓您在事件發生時執行自訂的常式。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出支援的事件控制項。The following table lists the events supported by the control. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||按一下 控制項中的按鈕時會發生這個事件。Occurs when a button within a control is clicked. 此事件通常用於在控制項中按下按鈕時執行工作。This event is often used to perform a task when a button is clicked in the control.| ||在所有發生物件都會建立控制項。Occurs after all objects are created in the control. 此事件通常用於顯示之前修改記錄的值。This event is often used to modify the values of a record before it is displayed.| ||發生於刪除 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Delete") 按一下時，但之後控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來檢查刪除作業的結果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||發生於按一下的 [刪除] 按鈕前,控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來取消刪除作業。This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.| ||發生於插入按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 插入 」) 按一下時，但之後控制項插入資料錄。Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用於檢查插入作業的結果。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||發生於按一下的 [插入] 按鈕前,控制項才會插入記錄。Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用來取消插入作業。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.| ||發生於更新 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 按一下時，但之後控制項更新資料列。Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked, but after the control updates the row. 若要檢查更新作業的結果通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||發生於按一下的更新 按鈕前,控制更新的記錄。Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常用來取消更新作業。This event is often used to cancel the update operation.| ||之後，就會發生控制項變更模式 （若要編輯、 插入或唯讀模式）。Occurs after the control changes modes (to edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常用來執行工作時控制項變更模式。This event is often used to perform a task when the control changes modes.| ||發生於之前控制項變更模式 （若要編輯、 插入或唯讀模式）。Occurs before the control changes modes (to edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常用來取消模式變更。This event is often used to cancel a mode change.| ||按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 當您需要執行的工作之後使用者巡覽至不同的記錄控制項中, 時，通常使用這個事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 控制項處理分頁作業之前。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用於取消的分頁作業。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles 控制項可讓您在標記中指定的 CSS 樣式規則。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果您使用範本自訂外觀控制項，您可以指定 CSS 樣式中的範本中的標記。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在此情況下，額外外部資料表不是必要的。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 您可以防止資料表呈現的設定屬性`false`。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項具有內建的分頁功能，可讓使用者瀏覽至不同資料來源中的記錄。The control has built-in paging capabilities, which allow a user to navigate to a different record in the data source. 分頁功能可以搭配任何支援的資料來源物件介面或支援的資料來源分頁功能。The paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the interface or a data source that supports paging capability. 若要啟用分頁功能，將屬性`true`。To enable the paging feature, set the property to `true`. 您可以使用，以判斷基礎資料來源中的項目總數屬性。You can determine the total number of items in the underlying data source by using the property. 若要判斷目前所顯示的項目索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of the currently displayed item, use the property. 啟用分頁時，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在控制項。When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽區列包含頁面導覽控制項，而且可以顯示在頂端、 底端，或最上層及控制項的底部。The pager row contains the page navigation controls and can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 頁面巡覽區列有四個內建的頁面巡覽，顯示模式。The pager row has four built-in pager display modes. 下表描述四種模式。The following table describes the four modes. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`PagerButton.NextPrevious`|一組分頁控制項包含上一個和下一步 按鈕。A set of pagination controls consisting of previous and next buttons.| |`PagerButton.NextPreviousFirstLast`|一組分頁控制項，包含先前，接下來，第一個和最後一個按鈕。A set of pagination controls consisting of previous, next, first, and last buttons.| |`PagerButton.Numeric`|一組分頁控制項，包含用於直接存取頁面的編號連結按鈕。A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered link buttons to access pages directly. 此為預設模式。This is the default mode.| |`PagerButton.NumericFirstLast`|一組編號，第一個和最後一個連結按鈕所組成的重新編頁控制項。A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered and first and last link buttons.| > [!NOTE] > 控制項自動隱藏頁面巡覽列，當資料來源包含兩個以上的記錄。The control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains fewer than two records. 您可以使用來控制的設定 （例如頁面巡覽區顯示模式，在時間和頁面巡覽區控制項的文字標籤顯示的頁面連結數目） 的頁面巡覽列屬性。You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text label) by using the property. 若要控制項目的出現的頁面巡覽列 （包括其背景色彩和字型色彩），使用屬性。To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color and font color), use the property. 控制項也可讓您定義的頁面巡覽列的自訂範本。The control also allows you to define a custom template for the pager row. 如需有關如何建立自訂的頁面巡覽區列範本的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on creating a custom pager row template, see . 控制項提供數個事件，您可以使用分頁發生時執行自訂動作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs. 下表列出可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 當您需要執行的工作之後使用者巡覽至不同的記錄控制項中, 時，通常使用這個事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 控制項處理分頁作業之前。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用於取消的分頁作業。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| > [!NOTE] > 當您變更時，不會引發這些事件屬性以程式設計的方式。These events are not raised when you change the property programmatically. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來啟用中的分頁功能控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the paging feature in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewAllowPaging/CS/formviewallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewAllowPaging/VB/formviewallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁時 (當屬性設定為`true`)，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在控制項。When paging is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽區列包含控制項，讓使用者巡覽至其他記錄，並可顯示頂端、 底部，或同時上方和底部的控制項。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用屬性以程式設計方式存取物件，表示內的底部頁面巡覽區列控制項。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the bottom pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性之後，才可被控制項建立內的底部頁面巡覽區列事件。The property is available only after the control creates the bottom pager row in the event. 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式管理下方的頁面巡覽區列，例如當加入自訂內容。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content. 修改後必須執行屬性底端頁面巡覽區列表示物件已建立; 否則控制會覆寫任何變更。Any modification to the property must be performed after the object that represents the bottom pager row has been created; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取在底部顯示的頁面巡覽區列控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the pager row displayed at the bottom of a control. 頁面巡覽區資料列則會更新與其他內容中。The pager row is then updated with additional content. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 HTML 標題項目中的水平或垂直位置控制項。Use the property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control. 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices. 這個屬性會設定使用其中一種列舉值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`TableCaptionAlign.Bottom`|標題項目與資料表底端對齊。The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Left`|標題項目與資料表左邊對齊。The caption element is aligned with the left side of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`|未設定標題項目對齊。The caption element's alignment is not set.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Right`|標題項目與資料表的右邊對齊。The caption element is aligned with the right side of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Top`|標題項目與資料表的頂端對齊。The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.| > [!NOTE] > 當這個屬性設定為`TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`，會使用瀏覽器的預設值。When this property is set to `TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`, the default value of the browser is used. 其他可存取性支援控制項由提供屬性。Additional accessibility support for the control is provided by the property. 使用屬性來指定要呈現的 HTML 標題項目中的文字控制項。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定 HTML 標題中的項目控制項應該呈現控制項的左邊。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the HTML caption element in a control should be rendered on the left side of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 在相同的資料行中的所有資料格控制項具有相同的寬度。All cells in the same column of a control have the same width. 填補數量會套用到最寬的資料格和資料行中的所有資料格會調整為該儲存格的寬度。The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column are adjusted to that cell width. 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格具有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height. 填補數量會套用到資料列中最高的儲存格和資料列中的所有資料格會調整為該儲存格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row are adjusted to that cell height. 個別儲存格大小不能指定。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. 若要調整儲存格之間的間距，請使用屬性。To adjust the spacing between cells, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 當這個屬性未在設定中時，瀏覽器會使用預設值。When this property is not set, the default value of the browser is used. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的儲存格的內容和儲存格的框線之間的間距大小。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否控制項處於編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。Use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 下表列出不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`FormViewMode.Edit`|控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`FormViewMode.Insert`|控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`FormView.ReadOnly`|控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| 這個值通常自動設定控制當新增、 更新、 插入、 刪除或取消命令按鈕。This value is normally set automatically by the control when the New, Update, Insert, Delete, or Cancel command button is clicked. 當控制項變更以回應動作的模式，則下表中的事件會引發。When the control changes modes in response to an action, the events in the following table are raised. 這可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式，事件發生時執行適當的常式。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs the appropriate routine when the event occurs. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||發生時控制項變更模式，但模式變更之後。Occurs when the control changes modes, but after the mode changes. 此事件通常用來執行工作時控制項變更模式。This event is commonly used to perform a task whenever the control changes modes.| ||發生時控制項變更模式，但模式變更之前。Occurs when the control changes modes, but before the mode changes. 此事件通常用來取消模式變更。This event is commonly used to cancel the mode change.| **請注意**模式變更以程式設計方式使用時，不會引發這些事件方法。**Note** These events are not raised when you change the mode programmatically by using the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否控制項處於編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 如果使用者嘗試瀏覽至另一個記錄 while控制項是在 編輯多個，已取消的分頁作業。If the user attempts to navigate to another record while the control is in edit more, the paging operation is canceled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否控制權回到編輯、 插入或唯讀模式更新之後，執行 [插入] 或取消作業。Use the property to specify whether the control returns to edit, insert, or read-only mode after an update, insert, or cancel operation is performed. 根據預設，傳回以唯讀模式的控制項; 不過，您可以保留控制中編輯，或插入模式下，此屬性設定為適當的值。By default, the control returns to read-only mode; however, you can keep the control in edit or insert mode by setting this property to the appropriate value. 下表列出不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`FormViewMode.Edit`|控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`FormViewMode.Insert`|控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`FormViewMode.ReadOnly`|控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| 這個屬性通常是使用控制項對單一用途，例如只插入或編輯資料錄。This property is commonly used when the control has a single purpose, such as only to insert or edit records. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以保留控制項處於編輯模式，在更新作業之後。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to keep a control in edit mode after an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDefaultMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDefaultMode/CS/formviewdefaultmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDefaultMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDefaultMode/VB/formviewdefaultmodevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項呈現不同的範本，根據目前的控制項模式的資料列 (所指定屬性)。The control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the property). 下表顯示每個模式所用的範本。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|呈現的範本Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |EditEdit|| |InsertInsert|| |唯讀Read-only|| 使用屬性可定義您自己的使用者介面 (UI)，資料列時控制項處於編輯模式。Use the property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the control is in edit mode. 編輯項目範本通常包含輸入的控制項和使用者更新現有的記錄，以及更新的記錄，以及取消更新作業的命令按鈕的值。The edit item template usually contains the input controls for the user to update the values of an existing record, as well as command buttons to update the record and to cancel the update operation. 若要指定自訂範本，第一個地方``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify the custom template, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 使用雙向繫結運算式，您可以將欄位與輸入控制項產生關聯。By using a two-way binding expression, you can associate a field with an input control. 這可讓控制項自動顯示相關聯輸入控制項處於編輯模式中的 原始欄位值。This allows the control to automatically display the original field value in the associated input control in edit mode. 更新記錄時，自動從相關聯輸入控制項擷取更新的欄位值的控制項。When a record is updated, the control automatically extracts the updated field value from the associated input control. 如需雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). 若要建立執行內建的取消和更新作業的命令按鈕，將命令按鈕控制項加入至具有範本其`CommandName`下表中列出的屬性設定為其中一個值。To create command buttons that perform the built-in cancel and update operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table. |命令按鈕類型Command button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|[取消]"Cancel"| |更新Update|「 更新 」"Update"| 您可以使用來控制的項目範本外觀屬性。You can control the appearance of the item template by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何定義自訂的範本資料列處於編輯模式。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for a data row in edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewEditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewEditItemTemplate/CS/formviewedititemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewEditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewEditItemTemplate/VB/formviewedititemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制資料的外觀資料列時控制項處於編輯模式。Use the property to control the appearance of the data row when a control is in edit mode. 當控制項處於編輯模式，資料列會顯示由指定使用者定義的內容屬性。When the control is in edit mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the property. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`). - 巢狀``開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂樣式的資料列時控制項處於編輯模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom style for a data row when a control is in edit mode. summary.span: 擷取資料列中宣告的每個欄位值，並將它們儲存在指定的 物件中。

span.span: Retrieves the values of each field declared within the data row and stores them in the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫控制項來擷取資料列內宣告的每個欄位的值。The method is a helper method called by the control to retrieve the values of each field declared within the data row. 由於資料列會顯示不同的範本，根據目前的模式，則這個方法會擷取只宣告對應於目前的模式的範本中的欄位值。Because the data row displays a different template based on the current mode, this method retrieves only the field values declared in the template that corresponds to the current mode. 下表顯示可用的模式和對應的範本。The following table shows the available modes and the corresponding templates. |模式Mode|範本Template| |----------|--------------| |InsertInsert|| |EditEdit|| |唯讀Read-only|| 您可以指定擷取的值使用是否包含索引鍵欄位`includeKeys`參數。You can specify whether the extracted values include the key field or fields by using the `includeKeys` parameter.

span.para: 在擴充類別，您可以覆寫此方法以建立您自己的常式，以擷取欄位值。
When extending the class, you can override this method to create your own routine to retrieve the field values.

summary.span: 取得 物件，表示 控制項中的頁尾資料列。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the footer row in a control.

value.span: ，表示 控制項中的頁尾資料列。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部負責控制何時或屬性設定。The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the control when the or property is set. 使用屬性以程式設計方式存取物件，代表頁尾資料列。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the footer row. > [!NOTE] > 屬性之後，才可被控制項建立頁尾資料列中的事件。The property is available only after the control creates the footer row in the event. 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式操作頁尾資料列，例如當加入自訂內容。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content. 修改後必須執行屬性控制項已呈現，否則控制會覆寫任何變更。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been rendered; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. 若要控制頁尾資料列的樣式，請使用屬性。To control the style of the footer row, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用以程式設計方式修改期間的頁尾資料列的內容屬性事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically modify the properties of the footer row during the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部負責控制何時或屬性設定。The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the control when the or property is set. 使用屬性，即可控制頁尾資料列中的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of the footer row in a control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `FooterStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `FooterStyle-ForeColor`). - 巢狀``開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest a `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FooterStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FooterStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定頁尾資料列的自訂樣式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom style for the footer row. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項呈現不同的範本，根據目前的控制項模式的資料列 (所指定屬性)。The control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the property). 下表顯示每個模式所用的範本。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|呈現的範本Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |EditEdit|| |InsertInsert|| |唯讀Read-only|| 使用屬性可定義您自己的使用者介面 (UI)，資料列時控制項處於插入模式。Use the property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the control is in insert mode. 插入項目範本通常包含使用者輸入新的記錄的值，以及命令按鈕來插入記錄，及取消插入作業的輸入的控制項。The insert item template usually contains the input controls for the user to enter the values for the new record, as well as command buttons to insert the record and to cancel the insert operation. 若要指定自訂範本，第一個地方``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify the custom template, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 使用雙向繫結運算式，您可以將欄位與輸入控制項產生關聯。By using a two-way binding expression, you can associate a field with an input control. 插入一筆記錄、控制項自動擷取的欄位值相關聯輸入控制項。When a record is inserted, the control automatically extracts the field value from the associated input control. 如需雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). 若要建立執行內建的取消和插入作業的命令按鈕，將命令按鈕控制項加入至具有範本其`CommandName`下表中列出的屬性設定為其中一個值。To create command buttons that perform the built-in cancel and insert operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table. |命令按鈕類型Command button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|[取消]"Cancel"| |InsertInsert|「 插入 」"Insert"| 您可以使用來控制的項目範本外觀屬性。You can control the appearance of the item template by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何在插入模式下定義資料列的自訂範本。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for a data row in insert mode. summary.span: 按一下 控制項中的按鈕時會發生這個事件。

span.span: Occurs when a button within a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內按鈕時引發事件按一下控制項時。The event is raised when a button within the control is clicked. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 按鈕內控制項也可以叫用的某些內建控制項的功能。Buttons within a control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control. 若要執行這些作業之一，設定`CommandName`下表中的值的其中一個按鈕的屬性。To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table. |CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |[取消]"Cancel"|取消編輯或插入作業，並傳回控制項以指定的模式屬性。Cancels an edit or insert operation and returns the control to the mode specified by the property. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |"Delete""Delete"|刪除現有的記錄。Deletes the current record. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |[編輯]"Edit"|將控制項處於編輯模式。Puts the control in edit mode. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 插入 」"Insert"|將目前的資料錄插入資料來源。Inserts the current record in the data source. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |"New""New"|將在插入模式下的控制項。Puts the control in insert mode. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 頁面 」"Page"|執行分頁作業。Performs a paging operation. 設定`CommandArgument`"First"，"持續 」 按鈕、 下一步 」、 「 Prev"，或執行頁碼，以指定的分頁作業類型的屬性。Set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 更新 」"Update"|更新資料來源中目前的資料錄。Updates the current record in the data source. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| 雖然按一下按鈕，在上表所列時，會引發事件，則建議您使用作業的資料表中列出的事件。Although the event is raised when a button listed in the previous table is clicked, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table for the operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷命令名稱並按之按鈕的命令引數。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked. 若要判斷命令名稱和命令引數，請使用和屬性，分別。To determine the command name and command argument, use the and properties, respectively. 您也可以存取使用引發事件的控制項屬性。You can also access the control that raised the event by using the property. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以處理按鈕按一下控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to handle a button click in a control. 當使用者按一下 [新增] 按鈕時，要將目前所顯示的項目加入至控制項。When the user clicks the Add button, the currently displayed item is added to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewItemCommandEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewItemCommandEventArgs/CS/formviewcommandeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewItemCommandEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewItemCommandEventArgs/VB/formviewcommandeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項內的 [刪除] 按鈕時，但是在刪除作業之後。

span.span: Occurs when a Delete button within a control is clicked, but after the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時刪除 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Delete") 控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項刪除資料錄。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the control deletes the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如檢查刪除作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷受影響的刪除作業記錄的數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of records affected by the delete operation, use the property. 使用屬性來判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果您想要存取非索引鍵欄位的已刪除的記錄與索引鍵欄位的名稱/值組，使用和屬性，分別。If you want to access the name/value pairs of the key fields and non-key fields of the deleted record, use the and properties, respectively. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以判斷是否刪除作業期間發生例外狀況。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/formviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/formviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項內的 [刪除] 按鈕時，但是在刪除作業之前。

span.span: Occurs when a Delete button within a control is clicked, but before the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時刪除 按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Delete") 控制項內按一下時前,控制項刪除資料錄。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but before the control deletes the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如記錄刪除之前先驗證，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as verifying a record before deleting it, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您判斷要刪除記錄的索引，並指出應該取消刪除作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要判斷記錄的索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of a record, use the property. 若要取消刪除作業，請設定屬性`true`。To cancel the delete operation, set the property to `true`. 您也可以存取的索引鍵欄位和非索引鍵欄位，使用和屬性，分別。You can also access the key fields and non-key fields by using the and properties, respectively. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取消刪除作業的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeleteEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeleteEventArgs/CS/formviewdeleteeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeleteEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeleteEventArgs/VB/formviewdeleteeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項內的 [插入] 按鈕時，但是在插入作業之後。

span.span: Occurs when an Insert button within a control is clicked, but after the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時插入按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 插入 」) 控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項插入資料錄。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如檢查插入作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷受影響插入作業的記錄數目，使用屬性。To determine the number of records affected by the insert operation, use the property. 使用屬性來判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果您要存取插入記錄的值，請使用屬性。If you need to access the values of the inserted record, use the property. 根據預設，控制項會傳回所指定的模式之後插入作業的屬性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an insert operation. 若要保留控制項在插入模式下，設定屬性`true`。To keep the control in insert mode, set the property to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以判斷是否在插入作業期間發生例外狀況。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項內的 [插入] 按鈕，但是在插入作業之前。

span.span: Occurs when an Insert button within a control is clicked, but before the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時插入按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 插入 」) 控制項內按一下時前,控制項才會插入記錄。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如 HTML 編碼記錄的值插入資料來源中，每當發生此事件之前的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as HTML encoding the values of a record before inserting it in the data source, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷值的選擇性命令引數傳送至控制項，並指出應該取消插入作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the control and to indicate that the insert operation should be canceled. 命令引數的值會對應到`CommandArgument`屬性的 [插入] 按鈕。The command argument value corresponds to the `CommandArgument` property of the Insert button. 當`CommandArgument`[插入] 按鈕的屬性設定，請使用屬性來判斷命令的引數的值。When the `CommandArgument` property of the Insert button is set, use the property to determine the value of the command argument. 若要取消的插入作業，請設定屬性`true`。To cancel the insert operation, set the property to `true`. 您也可以讀取或修改新記錄的欄位值使用屬性。You can also read or modify the field values for the new record by using the property. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取消插入作業的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertEventArgs/CS/formviewinserteventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertEventArgs/VB/formviewinserteventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定當 控制項處於唯讀模式時，控制項中資料列的自訂內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for the data row in a control when the control is in read-only mode.

value.span: 包含 控制項在唯讀模式時的資料列自訂內容。

span.span: A that contains the custom content for the data row when the control is in read-only mode.

value.span: 預設值為 null，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項呈現不同的範本，根據目前的控制項模式的資料列 (所指定屬性)。The control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the property). 下表顯示每個模式所用的範本。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|呈現的範本Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |EditEdit|| |InsertInsert|| |唯讀Read-only|| 使用屬性可定義您自己的使用者介面 (UI)，資料列時控制項處於唯讀模式。Use the property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the control is in read-only mode. 項目範本通常包含控制項來顯示欄位值的記錄，以及命令按鈕來編輯、 插入和刪除記錄。The item template usually contains controls to display the field values of a record, as well as command buttons to edit, insert, and delete a record. 若要指定自訂範本，第一個地方``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify the custom template, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要顯示的欄位值繫結至控制項的資料來源，使用資料繫結運算式。To display the field values of the data source bound to the control, use a data-binding expression. 如需資料繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information on data-binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). 若要建立執行內建的刪除、 編輯和新的記錄作業的命令按鈕，將命令按鈕控制項加入至具有範本其`CommandName`下表中列出的屬性設定為其中一個值。To create command buttons that perform the built-in delete, edit, and new record operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table. |命令按鈕類型Command button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |刪除Delete|"Delete""Delete"| |EditEdit|[編輯]"Edit"| |新增New|"New""New"| 您可以使用來控制的項目範本外觀屬性。You can control the appearance of the item template by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在唯讀模式中定義的自訂範本資料列。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for a data row in read-only mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewEditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewEditItemTemplate/CS/formviewedititemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewEditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewEditItemTemplate/VB/formviewedititemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時的 [更新] 按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 控制項內按一下時，但之後控制更新的記錄。The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查更新作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷更新作業所影響的記錄數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the property. 使用屬性來判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果您需要存取更新記錄的索引鍵欄位值，使用屬性。If you need to access the key field values for the updated record, use the property. 原始及更新的非索引鍵欄位值可以使用存取和屬性，分別。The original and updated non-key field values can be accessed using the and properties, respectively. 根據預設，控制項會傳回所指定的模式之後更新作業的屬性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 若要保留控制項處於編輯模式下，設定屬性`true`。To keep the control in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以判斷是否更新作業期間發生例外狀況。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷值的選擇性命令引數傳送至控制項，並指出應該取消更新作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the control and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled. 命令引數的值會對應到`CommandArgument`屬性的 [更新] 按鈕。The command argument value corresponds to the `CommandArgument` property of the Update button. 當`CommandArgument`[更新] 按鈕的屬性設定，請使用屬性來判斷命令的引數的值。When the `CommandArgument` property of the Update button is set, use the property to determine the value of the command argument. 若要取消更新作業，請設定屬性`true`。To cancel the update operation, set the property to `true`. 您也可以讀取或修改使用使用者所輸入的新值和屬性。You can also read or modify the new values entered by the user by using the and properties. 屬性包含的索引鍵欄位，而屬性包含非索引鍵欄位。The property contains the key fields, while the property contains the non-key fields. 如果您要存取原始的非索引鍵欄位值，請使用屬性。If you need to access the original non-key field values, use the property. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取消更新作業的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel an update operation. summary.span: 發生於 控制項在編輯、插入和唯讀模式之間切換時，但在模式變更後。

span.span: Occurs when the control switches between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the mode has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時控制項嘗試切換之間編輯、 插入和唯讀模式，但在模式實際變更之後。The event is raised when a control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the mode actually changes. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如同步處理的事件處理方法與另一個控制項，此事件發生時的控制項。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as synchronizing the control with another control, whenever this event occurs. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件的標頭資料列中顯示目前的模式控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to display the current mode in the header row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewModeChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewModeChanged/CS/formviewmodechangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewModeChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewModeChanged/VB/formviewmodechangedvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在 控制項在編輯、插入和唯讀模式之間切換，但在模式尚未變更之前發生。

span.span: Occurs when the control switches between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時切換之間編輯、 插入和唯讀模式，但模式實際變更之前嘗試控制項。The event is raised when a control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes. 這可讓您提供事件處理方法，執行自訂的常式，例如設定控制特定的模式，或取消模式變更時就會發生此事件。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as configuring the control for a specific mode or canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷要模式切換控制項，以判斷是否使用者取消編輯作業，因此已引發事件或表示表示應該取消這項插入作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the mode to which the control is switching, to determine whether the event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation, or to indicate that an insert operation should be canceled. 若要判斷新的模式，請使用屬性。To determine the new mode, use the property. 您也可以使用切換至替代的模式設定為其中一個屬性列舉值。You can also use the property to switch to an alternate mode by setting it to one of the enumeration values. 使用屬性來判斷使用者是否已取消編輯作業。Use the property to determine whether the user canceled an edit operation. 若要取消插入作業，請設定屬性`true`。To cancel an insert operation, set the property to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以隱藏頁面巡覽區資料列時控制轉換至編輯模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to hide the pager row when the control transitions to edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewModeEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewModeEventArgs/CS/formviewmodeeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewModeEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewModeEventArgs/VB/formviewmodeeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 處理透過控制階層架構向上傳遞的事件。

span.span: Handles an event passed up through the control hierarchy.

returns.span: 表示事件應該還要在控制階層架構向上傳遞，否則為 。

span.span: to indicate the event should be passed further up the control hierarchy; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由控制項來選擇性地處理透過由在控制項階層架構中向上傳遞的事件方法。The method is used by the control to optionally handle events passed up through the control hierarchy by the method. 它會判斷是否要檢查的內容來處理事件中所含物件`e`參數。It determines whether to handle an event by examining the properties of the object contained in the `e` parameter. 當事件需要處理時，此方法會執行適當的動作。When an event needs to be handled, the method performs the appropriate action. 會忽略其他事件，並在控制項階層架構中向上傳遞。Other events are ignored and passed up the control hierarchy. 這個方法會指出是否要將事件傳遞進一步設定在控制項階層架構，透過它的傳回值。This method indicates whether to pass the event further up the control hierarchy through its return value. Control 覆寫這個方法，以在按一下其中一個辨識控制項的按鈕時執行適當的動作的基底實作。The control overrides the base implementation of this method to perform the appropriate action when one of the buttons recognized by the control is clicked. 下表列出的命令按鈕的控制項辨認。The following table lists the command buttons that the control recognizes. |按鈕Button|CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| |取消Cancel|[取消]"Cancel"|取消作業，並捨棄使用者所輸入的值，更新或插入作業中使用。Used in updating or inserting operations to cancel the operation and to discard the values entered by the user. 控制然後傳回所指定的模式屬性。The control then returns to the mode specified by the property.| |刪除Delete|"Delete""Delete"|用於刪除作業，以刪除資料來源中顯示的記錄。Used in deleting operations to delete the displayed record from the data source. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |EditEdit|[編輯]"Edit"|在更新作業中用來放置控制項處於編輯模式。Used in updating operations to put the control in edit mode. 在指定的內容屬性會顯示為資料列。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |InsertInsert|「 插入 」"Insert"|用於插入作業，以嘗試在資料來源中插入新的記錄，使用者所提供的值。Used in inserting operations to attempt to insert a new record in the data source with the values provided by the user. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |新增New|"New""New"|在插入作業中用來放置在插入模式下的控制項。Used in inserting operations to put the control in insert mode. 在指定的內容屬性會顯示為資料列。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |頁面Page|「 頁面 」"Page"|用於分頁作業，以代表執行分頁的頁面巡覽列中按鈕。Used in paging operations to represent a button in the pager row that performs paging. 指定的分頁作業，請設定`CommandArgument`下一步 」、 「 Prev"、"First"、 「 最後 」，或要瀏覽頁面的索引按鈕的屬性。To specify the paging operation, set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "Next", "Prev", "First", "Last", or the index of the page to which to navigate. 引發和事件。Raises the and events. **注意：** 這種類型的按鈕通常只用於頁面巡覽區範本。**Note:** This type of button is typically used only in the pager template.| |更新Update|「 更新 」"Update"|用於更新作業，以嘗試更新資料來源中顯示的記錄，使用者所提供的值。Used in updating operations to attempt to update the displayed record in the data source with the values provided by the user. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| 這個版本的方法會傳回`true`當其中一個按鈕處理。This version of the method returns `true` when one of these buttons is handled. 如需事件反昇的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event bubbling, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

span.para: 在擴充類別，您可以覆寫此方法以處理您自己的事件。請務必使用傳回值，指出是否應該傳遞事件進一步向上在控制項階層架構。
When extending the class, you can override this method to handle your own events. Make sure to use the return value to indicate whether the event should be passed further up the control hierarchy.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫控制項引發事件。The method is called by the control to raise the event. 擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員使用類別。It is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫控制項引發事件。The method is called by the control to raise the event. 擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員使用類別。It is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

exception.span: 這個方法是在 控制項未繫結至資料來源控制項、使用者未取消更新作業，以及事件未註冊事件處理常式時呼叫。

span.span: This method is called when the control is not bound to a data source control, the user did not cancel the update operation, and an event handler is not registered for the event.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 取得要顯示資料來源中所有資料錄的所需頁面總數。

span.span: Gets the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source.

value.span: 基礎資料來源中的項目數目。

span.span: The number of items in the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁功能時 (當屬性設定為`true`)，使用屬性，以判斷基礎資料來源中的記錄總數。When the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), use the property to determine the total number of records in the underlying data source. > [!NOTE] > 因為控制項會顯示一次只有一筆記錄，此值對應至顯示資料來源中的每一筆記錄所需的分頁總數。Because the control displays only one record at a time, this value corresponds to the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source. 此值才會準確之後會發生資料繫結。This value is not accurate until after data-binding occurs. 若要判斷目前的記錄從基礎資料來源的索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of the current record from the underlying data source, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷在控制項中顯示的記錄總數。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the total number of records displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewPagerTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPagerTemplate/CS/formviewpagertemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewPagerTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPagerTemplate/VB/formviewpagertemplatevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The zero-based index of the data item being displayed in a control from the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁功能時 (當屬性設定為`true`)，使用屬性來判斷目前所顯示的記錄的索引。When the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), use the property to determine the index of the currently displayed record. 您也可以使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式變更顯示的記錄。You can also use this property to programmatically change the displayed record. > [!NOTE] > 啟用分頁功能時，您也可以使用這個屬性來判斷顯示; 記錄的頁面數目不過，請注意這個屬性是以零為起始。When the paging feature is enabled, you can also use this property to determine the page number of the record displayed; however, be aware that this property is zero-based. 若要判斷資料來源中的項目總數，請使用屬性。To determine the total number of items in the data source, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來決定顯示的資料錄的頁面索引。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the page index of the displayed record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewPagerTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPagerTemplate/CS/formviewpagertemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewPagerTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPagerTemplate/VB/formviewpagertemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於 屬性值在分頁作業之後變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes after a paging operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時的頁面巡覽區按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 頁面 」) 控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項負責的分頁作業。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 當您以程式設計方式設定時，不會引發這個事件屬性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 頁面巡覽區按鈕通常位於中的頁面巡覽區列控制項。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. 此事件通常用來同步處理用來控制控制項或設定行為分頁作業之後的控制項。This event is often used to synchronize a control with a control or to set the behavior of the control after a paging operation. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以傳回為唯讀模式，當使用者巡覽至另一筆記錄。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to return the to read-only mode when the user navigates to another record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewPageIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPageIndexChanged/CS/formviewpageindexchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewPageIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPageIndexChanged/VB/formviewpageindexchangedvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於 屬性值在分頁作業前變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes before a paging operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時的頁面巡覽區按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 頁面 」) 控制項內按一下時前,控制項負責的分頁作業。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 當您以程式設計方式設定時，不會引發這個事件屬性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 頁面巡覽區按鈕通常位於中的頁面巡覽區列控制項。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. A物件傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您判斷使用者所選頁面的索引，並指出應該取消的分頁作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled. 若要判斷使用者所選頁面的索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the property. 若要取消的分頁作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the paging operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取消分頁作業的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel a paging operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 取得 物件的參考，可以讓您設定 控制項中頁面巡覽區按鈕的屬性。

span.span: Gets a reference to the object that allows you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a control.

value.span: 物件的參考，可以讓您設定 控制項中頁面巡覽區按鈕的屬性。

span.span: A reference to the that allows you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的設定中的頁面巡覽區列控制項。Use the property to control the settings of the pager row in a control. 頁面巡覽列會顯示啟用分頁功能時 (當屬性設定為`true`)，並包含可讓使用者瀏覽至不同的記錄控制項中的控制項。The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different records in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `PagerSettings-Mode`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `PagerSettings-Mode`). 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PagerSettings.Mode`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerSettings.Mode`). 頁面巡覽區列的顯示模式和自訂文字或影像的導覽控制項，通常包含一般設定。Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的頁面巡覽區列的屬性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the properties of the pager row. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewAllowPaging/CS/formviewallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewAllowPaging/VB/formviewallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來控制頁面巡覽列中的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of the pager row in a control. 頁面巡覽列會顯示啟用分頁功能時 (當屬性設定為`true`)，且包含可讓使用者瀏覽至控制項中的不同頁面的控制項。The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `PagerStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `PagerStyle-ForeColor`). - 巢狀``開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest a `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PagerStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的頁面巡覽列的樣式設定。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the style settings for the pager row. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewAllowPaging/CS/formviewallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewAllowPaging/VB/formviewallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面巡覽列會顯示在控制啟用分頁功能時 (當屬性設定為 true)。A pager row is displayed in a control when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to true). 頁面巡覽區列包含允許使用者瀏覽至控制項中的不同頁面的控制項。The pager row contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control. 而不是使用內建的頁面巡覽區的資料列的使用者介面 (UI)，您可以定義自己的 UI 使用屬性。Instead of using the built-in pager row user interface (UI), you can define your own UI by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 當屬性設定它會覆寫內建的頁面巡覽列 UI。When the property is set it overrides the built-in pager row UI. 若要指定頁面巡覽區列的自訂範本，先將``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom template for the pager row, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要控制項目的出現的頁面巡覽列，使用屬性。To control the appearance of the pager row, use the property. 通常，按鈕控制項就會加入至頁面巡覽區範本，進行分頁作業。Typically, button controls are added to the pager template to perform the paging operations. 分頁作業使用的按鈕控制項時，控制項執行其`CommandName`按一下屬性設定為 「 頁面 」。The control performs a paging operation when a button control with its `CommandName` property set to "Page" is clicked. 按鈕的`CommandArgument`屬性會決定要執行的分頁作業的類型。The button's `CommandArgument` property determines the type of paging operation to perform. 下表列出支援的命令引數值控制項。The following table lists the command argument values supported by the control. |CommandArgument 值CommandArgument value|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |「 下一步"Next"|巡覽至下一頁。Navigates to the next page.| |「 Prev""Prev"|瀏覽至上一頁。Navigates to the previous page.| |"First""First"|巡覽至第一頁。Navigates to the first page.| |「 最後 」"Last"|巡覽至最後一頁。Navigates to the last page.| |整數值Integer value|巡覽至指定的頁面數目。Navigates to the specified page number.| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何定義自訂頁面巡覽區範本。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom pager template. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewPagerTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPagerTemplate/CS/formviewpagertemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewPagerTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPagerTemplate/VB/formviewpagertemplatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓內嵌樣式屬性，例如套用到所有的轉譯控制項的 HTML，ASP.NET 含括在轉譯的 HTML`table`項目。In order to make inline style properties such as apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element. 如果您不想外部`table`要呈現的項目會將此屬性設定為`false`。If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`. 在此情況下，如果您嘗試設定內嵌套用至整個控制項的樣式屬性，就會擲回例外狀況。In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性以程式設計方式存取物件，表示資料列。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the data row. 資料列包含不同的內容以範本為目前的模式呈現 (指定的屬性)。The data row contains different content based on the template rendered for the current mode (specified by the property). 您只可以存取目前的模式的範本的內容。You can only access the contents of the template for the current mode. 下表顯示每個模式所用的範本。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|呈現的範本Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |EditEdit|| |InsertInsert|| |唯讀Read-only|| > [!NOTE] > 屬性之後，才可被控制項建立中的資料列事件。The property is available only after the control creates the data row in the event. 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式管理資料列時，例如當加入自訂內容。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the data row, for example when adding custom content. 修改後必須執行屬性控制項已資料繫結，否則控制會覆寫任何變更。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been data-bound; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取期間的資料列內容事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the properties of the data row during the event.
