remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制資料的外觀資料列時控制項處於唯讀狀態 （顯示） 模式。Use the property to control the appearance of the data row when a control is in read-only (display) mode. 當控制項處於唯讀模式中，資料列會顯示所指定的使用者定義內容屬性。When the control is in read-only mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the property. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `RowStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `RowStyle-ForeColor`). - 巢狀``開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `RowStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RowStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂樣式的資料列時控制項處於唯讀模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom style for a data row when a control is in read-only mode. summary.span: 取得 物件，表示顯示於 控制項上方的頁面巡覽列。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the pager row displayed at the top of a control.

value.span: ，表示 控制項上方的頁面巡覽列。

span.span: A that represents the top pager row in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁時 (當屬性設定為`true`)，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在控制項。When paging is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽區列包含控制項，讓使用者巡覽至其他記錄，並可顯示頂端、 底部，或同時上方和底部的控制項。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用屬性以程式設計方式存取物件，代表在最上層頁面巡覽列控制項。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the top pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性之後，才可被控制項建立的最上層頁面巡覽區列事件。The property is available only after the control creates the top pager row in the event. 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式操作最上層頁面巡覽列，例如當加入自訂內容。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content. 修改後必須執行屬性控制項已繫結至資料，否則控制會覆寫任何變更。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been bound to data; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取在頂端顯示的頁面巡覽列控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the pager row displayed at the top of a control. 頁面巡覽區資料列則會更新與其他內容中。The pager row is then updated with additional content. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewTopPagerRow/CS/formviewtoppagerrowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewTopPagerRow/VB/formviewtoppagerrowvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 更新資料來源中目前的資料錄。

span.span: Updates the current record in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項處於編輯模式，請使用方法來以程式設計方式更新資料來源中目前的記錄。When the control is in edit mode, use the method to programmatically update the current record in the data source. 這個方法通常使用於您需要更新目前的記錄從外部控制，例如來自不同頁面上的控制項。This method is commonly used when you need to update the current record from outside of the control, such as from a different control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫，否則這個方法時，控制項必須是處於編輯模式下就會擲回。The control must be in edit mode when this method is called; otherwise, an is thrown. 若要指定是否要將頁面驗證執行更新作業之前，請使用`causesValidation`參數。To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter. 呼叫這個方法也會引發和事件。Calling this method also raises the and events. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來以程式設計方式更新中的目前記錄資料來源中的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically update the current record in a control in the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdateItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdateItem/CS/formviewupdateitemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdateItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdateItem/VB/formviewupdateitemvb.aspx#1)]
